title: Comedian Theo Von, NBA Playoffs, And We're All In On Liquid Death
description:
NBA Playoffs are awesome and we try to watch Game 7 of the Blues/Stars while podcasting. The Sixers got whomped. Big Cat no longer misses Lebron (2:29 - 10:21) . The Warriors vs The Warriors is heating up and we play the Blame Game with Hank for the Celtics season (10:21 - 26:35). Hot Seat/Cool Throne including "Liquid Death" aka Water (26:35 - 46:42). Comedian Theo Von joins the show to talk about the comedy world, growing up in Louisiana, sports, and Coach O (46:42 - 88:05). Segments include Talking Soccer, PR 101 for Game of Thrones hating dogs, Thoughts and Prayers to Country House, and Guys on Chicks.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
